page.title: 07Newmillerdam Country Park
page.content: A major part of the landscape of our area is covered by the Newmillerdam Country Park.Situated next to the main Wakefield-Barnsley Road (A6l) the Park provides an area of great beauty. Deciduous woodlands surround a lake which contains 30 million gallons of water. Beside the lake Newmillerdam village maintains its character as it sits against the hill side. As might be expected the area is not only popular with the local people but also with many species of animals,birds and fish. Despite being close to an industrial area the environment does not appear to be suffering. Such is the attraction of the Park that it has recently been estimated that there are over a quarter of a million visitors to the Park per year.
